sections.heading: tax refund; procedure; applicability
sections.text: Section 77-1736.06 is expressly intended to apply to all claims for refund of any property taxes pending on June 11, 1991.SourceLaws 1991, LB 829, ยง 16;Laws 1992, Fourth Spec. Sess., LB 1, ยง 17.
